name: YOU and HIM(Prologue)
description:
A familiar stranger hitchhikes along the side of a deserted highway. 

The encounter is a potentially deadly one.

Can you survive? 

PLEASE NOTE: The game will later touch on sensitive subjects not yet included in the trigger warnings and should only be played by those who are 18+.  This game also acts as a demo/prologue to a larger project I plan to work on. 

Also this is my first game so please be gentle!
